text: The Audi A2 was a 5-door hatchback automobile produced by Audi from 1999 until 2005. The car was made from aluminium which made it light and economical but was expensive to produce, and demand for it fell later in its life, only one generation was made and had an indirect successor in 2010 with the A1. == Engines == === Petrol === * 1.4 16V 55 kW (75 hp) * 1.6 FSI 81 kW (110 hp) === Diesel === * 1.2 TDI 45 kW (61 hp) * 1.4 TDI 55 kW (75 hp) and 66 kW (90 hp) A2 Category:1990s automobiles Category:2000s automobiles
title: Audi A2
